maqras.text: atani snehitudu (kharinun) ila antadu: "O ma prabhu! Nenu itani talabirusutananni protsahincaledu, kani itade svayanga, margabhrastatvanlo cala duram velli poyadu
Ayana (allah) ila antadu: "Miru na daggara vaduladakandi mariyu vastavaniki nenu mundugane mi vaddaku heccarikanu pampi unnanu
na daggara mata marcatam jarugadu mariyu nenu na dasulaku an'yayam cesevadanu kanu
a roju memu narakanto: "Nivu nindipoyava?" Ani prasnistamu. Mariyu adi: "Inka emaina unda emiti?" Ani adugutundi
mariyu svargam daivabhiti galavari daggaraku tisukurabadutundi! Adi vari nundi e matram duranga undadu
(varito ila anabadutundi): "Ide miku vagdanam ceyabadinadi. Malli malli ma vaipuku marale prativaniki, (ma haddunu) laksyapettina (patincina) vaniki
agocarudaina a karunamayuniki bhayapadevaniki mariyu ma vaipunaku pascattapa hrdayanto maralevaniki
indulo (i svarganlo), santito pravesincandi. Ide sasvata jivita dinam
andulo variki, varu koredanta untundi. Mariyu ma daggara inka cala undi

mariyu memu, viriki purvam enno tarala varini nasanam cesamu. Varu viri kante ekkuva saktimantulu. Kani, (ma siksa padinappudu) varu desadim'marulai poyaru. Emi? Variki tappincukune margam edaina dorikinda
niscayanga, hrdayamunna vadiki, srad'dhato vinevadiki mariyu laksyapette vadiki indulo oka gunapathamundi
mariyu vastavanga! Memu akasalanu mariyu bhumini mariyu vati madhyanunna samastanni aru dinamulalo (ayyam lalo) srstincamu. Kani maku elanti alasata kalugaledu
kavuna (o muham'mad!) Varu palike matalaku sahanam vahincu mariyu ni prabhuvu pavitratanu koniyadu. Ayana stotralu ceyyi. Pratiroju suryodayaniki mundu mariyu suryastamayaniki mundu kuda
mariyu ratri velalo kuda ayana pavitratanu koniyadu mariyu sastangam (sajda) cesina taruvata kuda stutincu
Mariyu cevi yoggi vinu, catimpu cesevadu ati daggari nunce pilice rojuna
a roju miru oka bhayankara sabdam vinedi satyam. (Gorilalo nundi) bayatiki vacce dinam ade
niscayanga, meme jivanamicce varam mariyu meme maranimpajese varam mariyu mi andari maralimpu ma vaipunake jarugutundi
a roju bhumi cilipoyi varandaru parugidutu bayatiki vastaru. Ade samavesa samayam. Adi makento sulabham
varanedi maku baga telusu. Nivu varini (visvasincamani) balavantam ceyalevu. Kavuna na heccarikaku bhayapade vadiki matrame nivu i khur'an dvara hitabodha ceyyi
dum'mu eguravese vati (galula) saksiga
mariyu (niti) bharanni mose (meghala)
mariyu samudranlo sulabhanga teliyade (odala)
mariyu (ayana) ajnato (anugrahalanu) pancipette (devadutala saksiga)
niscayanga, miku ceyabadda vagdanam satyam
mariyu niscayanga tirpu ranunnadi
margalato nindina akasam saksiga
niscayanga, miru bhedabhiprayalalo padi unnaru
(satyam nundi) maralimpabadina vade, mosagimpabadina vadu
adharam leni abhiprayalu galavare nasanam ceyabadevaru
evaraite nirlaksyanlo padi asrad'dhaga unnaro
varu ila adugutunnaru: "Tirpudinam eppudu ranunnadi
a dinamuna, varu agnito dahimpabadataru (pariksimpabadataru)
(varito ila anabadutundi): "Mi pariksanu ruci cudandi! Miru dini korake tondara pettevaru
niscayanga, daivabhiti galavaru celamalu gala svargavanalalo untaru
tama prabhuvu tamaku prasadincina vatito santosapadutu! Niscayanga varu antaku purvam sajjanulai undevaru
varu ratrivelalo cala takkuvaga nidrapoyevaru
mariyu varu ratri civari ghadiyalalo ksamapana vedukune varu
mariyu vari sampadalo yacince variki mariyu avasyakata galavariki hakku untundi
Mariyu bhumilo kuda nam'mevari koraku enno nidarsanalu (ayat) unnayi
mariyu svayanga milo kuda unnayi. Emi? Miru cudalera
mariyu akasanlo mi jivanopadhi mariyu miku vagdanam ceyabadinadi undi
kavuna bhumyakasala prabhuvu saksiga! Niscayanga, idi satyam; e vidhanganaite miru matladagaligedi (satyamo)
emi? Ibrahim yokka gauravaniyulaina atithula gatha niku cerinda
varu atani vaddaku vaccinapudu: "Miku salam!" Ani annaru. Atanu: "Miku salam!" Ani javabicci: "Miru paricayam leni (kotta) varuga unnaru." Ani annadu
taruvata atanu tana intiloki poyi balisina (veyincina) oka avu dudanu tisukoni vaccadu
danini vari munduku jaripi: "Emi? Mirenduku tinatam ledu?" Ani adigadu
(varu tinakunda undatam cusi), vari nundi bhayapaddadu. Varannaru: "Bhayapadaku!" Mariyu varu ataniki jnanavantudaina kumaruni subhavartaniccaru
appudatani bharya arustu vari munduku vacci, tana cetini nuduti mida kottukuntu: "Nenu musalidanni, godralanu kada!" Ani annadi
varannaru: "Ni prabhuvu ilage annadu! Niscayanga, ayana mahavivekavantudu, sarvajnudu
